landingTitle: A Safe Space for Student Minds
landingSubtitle: दिव्यManas is your comprehensive, AI-driven partner for mental health support. Start your journey towards a healthier mind today.
landingSubtitleShort: AI-driven partner for mental health support.
contactUsDesc: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
name: Name
selectRoleToContinue: Please select your role to continue
selectCounselorType: Are you an on-campus or external counselor?
loginErrorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
loginErrorInvalid: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
platformEngagementDesc: Daily student engagement rate over the last week.
peerBuddyImpactDesc: Number of students supported by top peer buddies.
counsellorUtilizationDesc: Number of bookings for each on-campus counselor.

activeAlertsDesc: Students identified as being in a potential crisis.

userManagementDesc: View and manage all users on the platform.
allUsersDesc: A list of all registered users.
upcomingAppointmentsDesc: These appointments are pending your confirmation.

markedAsCompletedDesc: The appointment with {studentName} is now complete.
waitlistedAppointmentsDesc: Students you have placed on the waiting list.
movedToPendingDesc: {studentName}'s appointment has been moved to pending physical meet.
completedAppointmentsDesc: A history of your past appointments.
appointmentArchivedDesc: The completed appointment with {studentName} has been archived.
communityDiscussionsDesc: Engage with the student community in anonymous, moderated discussions.
createNewPostDesc: Share your thoughts with the community. Your post will be anonymous.
crisisAlertsDesc: The following students have been flagged by the AI system as being in a potential crisis. Please take immediate action.
actionLoggedDesc: Your action for {studentName} has been logged.
counsellorDashboardDesc: Here's a summary of your activity and upcoming tasks.
inYourSchedule: in your schedule for this week.
crisisAlertResolvedDesc: You resolved the crisis alert for {studentName}.
repliedToDiscussionDesc: You replied to the thread 'Feeling overwhelmed with finals'.
newDiscussionStartedDesc: You started a new discussion: 'How to deal with burnout?'
completedAppointmentsDescExternal: View your past appointments and file complaints if necessary.
recommendationDesc: Based on current demand and your availability, we suggest opening up two extra slots for this week.
scheduledAppointmentsDesc: Here are your upcoming confirmed virtual sessions.
sessionSummaryGeneratorDesc: Use AI to generate a student-friendly summary and actionable advice from your session notes.
sessionDetailsDesc: Provide the notes from your session to generate a summary.
sessionNotesPlaceholder: Enter your detailed, confidential notes from the session here...
missingInformationDesc: Please provide both the student's name and the session notes.
summaryGeneratedDesc: AI-powered summary and advice are ready for review.
generationFailedDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
aiGeneratedOutputDesc: Review the summary and advice before sending it to the student.
outputWillAppearHere: Output will appear here once generated.
emailSentDesc: The summary has been sent to the student's email.
waitlistedAppointmentsDescExternal: Manage students who are waiting for an appointment slot.
myProfileDesc: View and manage your public profile information.
title: Title
bioPlaceholder: Tell students a little bit about yourself and your approach.
bioDesc: A short bio to display on your profile.
profileUpdatedDesc: Your profile has been successfully updated.
welcomeToDemoDesc: This is a read-only demonstration of the दिव्यManas student experience.
demoFeaturesDisabled: For demonstration purposes, authentication and data saving features are disabled. Feel free to explore the user interface.
peerBuddyCertificationClaim: Claim Your Official Peer Buddy Certificate
peerBuddyCertificationDesc: You have successfully completed the required training and have been an active peer buddy. Request your certificate of completion below.
requestSentDesc: Your request for a certificate has been sent. It will be emailed to you within 5-7 business days.
peerBuddyDashboardDesc: Welcome! Here's an overview of your impact and community activity.
topConcernDesc: Most frequent topic in support requests.
supportRequestTrendsDesc: Monthly requests handled by the peer buddy program.
topConcernsDesc: Breakdown of the most common issues students are facing.
assessmentNotFoundDesc: The assessment you are looking for could not be found.
assessmentPrompt: Please answer the following questions to the best of your ability.
reportNotFoundDesc: You have not completed this assessment yet. Please take the assessment to view your report.
reportSaveAsPdf: This report is printable. You can save it as a PDF.
consolidatedReportDesc: This report summarizes the results of the assessments you have completed.
reportDisclaimer: Disclaimer: This report is a screening tool and not a substitute for a professional diagnosis. Please consult with a healthcare provider for a formal evaluation.
